QuestData.Title: Warchief's Command: Icecrown!
QuestData.Description:
All able-bodied members of the Horde are hereby ordered to report to Sky-Reaver Klum in Dalaran over Crystalsong Forest.
The Warsong Offensive needs more adventurers to bolster their assault on assault Icecrown Citadel and Arthas himself.
It is time to make the Lich King pay for his crimes.
For the Horde!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Sky-Reaver Klum in Dalaran over Crystalsong Forest.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Sky-Reaver Klum in Dalaran over Crystalsong Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: The Warsong Offensive is ready to strike at the heart of the Scourge, $c. Are you up to the challenge?
